markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Underwater Volcano](/Feats.aspx?ID=2313) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 15 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can cast [_volcanic eruption_](/Spells.aspx?ID=360) as a 7th-level primal innate spell once per day, except that you can only evoke the volcano on the floor of a body of water, and the effects that normally happen to flying creatures happen to swimming creatures instead.
name: Underwater Volcano
